short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export YouTube playlists to CSV or Excel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly save YouTube playlist details in CSV or Excel format with a simple click. 
No more manual copying—get video names, descriptions, and URLs instantly.

Features:  
- 🔗 Easy Export: Paste playlist URL and export instantly  
- 📂 CSV & Excel Support: Download in your preferred format  
- 🖥️ Clean Interface: Simple, user-friendly design  
- 🚀 Fast & Efficient: Save time on playlist management
